HomePage.description: What meaningful coincidence has crossed your path today? Capture the details to uncover hidden patterns.
HomePage.insightPlaceholderDescription: Fill out the form and our AI will provide an interpretation of your synchronicity event.

EventForm.myInterpretationDescription: Your own reflection can provide powerful context.
EventForm.numberRequired: A number or sign is required.

HelpPage.title: Help & Support
HelpPage.description: Your guide to understanding and using the Synchronicities app to its fullest potential.
HelpPage.welcomeParagraph1: Synchronicities is more than just a journal; it's a tool for self-discovery. By recording the meaningful coincidences in your life, you can begin to see the hidden patterns, messages, and guidance that the universe may be offering you.
HelpPage.welcomeParagraph2: This guide will walk you through how to use the app and get the most out of your journey.
HelpPage.eventEntryParagraph1: The heart of the app is the Event Entry form. Capturing details accurately helps the AI provide a more meaningful insight. Here's what to fill in:
HelpPage.eventEntryItem1Desc: The core of the synchronicity. This can be a number (like 11:11, 444) or any recurring sign, like 'a white feather.'
HelpPage.eventEntryItem2Desc: When the event occurred. The more precise, the better for pattern recognition.
HelpPage.eventEntryItem3Desc: The context of where you were and who you were with can be very significant.
HelpPage.eventEntryItem4Desc: How were you feeling? What were you thinking about? This context is crucial for a deeper interpretation.
HelpPage.eventEntryItem5Desc: Optionally attach a photo. You can upload a file or use your device's camera to capture the moment instantly.
HelpPage.eventEntryItem6Desc: Use the location button to automatically fill in your current geographical coordinates.
HelpPage.eventEntryParagraph2: After filling out the form, click 'Save & Generate Insight'. Our AI will analyze the data, including relevant news from that day and location, to provide a concise interpretation of what this event might mean for you.
HelpPage.dashboardParagraph1: The Dashboard is where your journey comes to life. It visualizes the data from your entries to help you see the bigger picture:
HelpPage.dashboardItem1Desc: Quickly see which numbers or signs are appearing most often in your life.
HelpPage.dashboardItem2Desc: This AI-powered analysis looks at all your events together, including your personal interpretations, to identify overarching themes and potential messages.
HelpPage.dashboardItem3Desc: Review all your past entries. You can add or edit your own interpretation at any time, and the 'Bigger Picture' analysis will update accordingly.
HelpPage.benefitsItem1: Increased Awareness: Become more attuned to the synchronicities happening around you.
HelpPage.benefitsItem2: Personal Insight: Gain a deeper understanding of your life's path, challenges, and opportunities.
HelpPage.benefitsItem3: Mindfulness: The practice of recording events fosters a greater sense of presence and connection to the world.
HelpPage.feedbackDescription: We'd love to hear your thoughts! How can we improve the app?
HelpPage.feedbackErrorDescription: Please provide a message or a rating before submitting.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage your account and data preferences.
SettingsPage.profileDescription: This information is managed via your Google Account.
SettingsPage.dataManagementDescription: Export or delete your personal event data.
SettingsPage.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your synchronicity events. Your account will not be affected.

ZenRoomPage.title: Zen Room
ZenRoomPage.description: Find your center. Select a track, close your eyes, and just breathe.
